My Creative Process

My UI/UX designs are created through a formula-based process to achieve desired results.

1

Discuss The Project

Discuss project goals with clients and/or team members to best meet their needs.

2

Brainstorming Concept

Begin the system design process to determine the build that will best satisfy all needs of the project.

3

UI/UX Planning

Create and test the front- and back-end of the application to ensure it meets the project goals and satisfies the user.

4

Interaction

Deliver and/or deploy the project for the client to confirm the project goals.
